name: Santa, Baby!
description:
Team

Nathan F. Grinzinger (fitzbuster) 
Julia Hauptmann
Jacqueline Lowe 
Johannes Lugstein (byteparrot)
Corina Sand

It's christmas, baby! Help Santa gather all the things he needs for a successful christmas eve. But behold, Father Christmas has been procrastinating again and there are only two minutes until the 24th! Be fast, be clever, and save christmas!

Don't forget to dress yourself and get all those presents onto the sleigh. Use your time wisely, because there is much more to be done...

Gameplay Instructions

Use WASD to wibblewobble around!
Press Spacebar to spank all those nasty objects!
Press E to feel the spirit of Christmas!

This game was made in 36 hours for Game Jam Hagenberg 2019.
